data.title: Comedy Central
data.meta_description: Free Tickets to see Artie Lange tape his Comedy Central TV Special at the Victoria Theater in Newark, NJ. Be a part of the live studio audience.
data.text:
ABOUT THE SHOW

What can be said about Artie Lange that hasn't already been said a thousand times... One of the most original comedians performing today, star of screen, tv and radio as well as a writer/producer. Artie. has done it all and has risen to the top of his game. From "The Howard Stern Show" to "Beer League", Artie entertains and tells the truth and always makes you laugh 'til you cry. His intense life journey has given his comedy a fierceness and honesty that is exhilarating to watch. He brings his blazing humor to his home state of New Jersey to entertain the lucky few. Don't miss out on seeing Artie Lange in the Garden State tearing it up.

Filming @ The Victoria Theater at the NJPAC

1 Center Street, Newark, NJ - MAP

This show taping is finished. Please check your local TV listings for showtimes.

Thank you very much for your interest in the show.- TheBlackListUS.com Audience Department.
